item.title: 特朗普向国会发表讲话后，交易员看到 S&P 500 指数剧烈波动
item.description: 本周美股一路狂飙，期权交易员预计，随着交易员评估最新的关税进展，并为周五的月度就业报告做好准备，美股还将继续狂飙。【原文：US stocks have been on a wild ride this week, and options traders expect more of that to come as traders assess the latest tariff developments and brace for Friday’s monthly jobs report.】

item.title: 平价之谈熄火，交易员加码押注欧元再涨 10
item.description: 交易商们正在增加赌注，赌欧元在未来几个月内将上涨 10%以上，最高升至 1.20 美元，这一水平上一次出现是在 2021 年。【原文：Traders are adding to wagers the euro will rise more than 10% in the coming months to as high as $1.20, a level last seen in 2021.】

item.title: 加纳通胀率连续第二个月放缓，降息成为关注焦点
item.description: 加纳通胀率连续第二个月放缓，为央行自 9 月份以来首次降息提供了空间。【原文：Ghana’s inflation slowed for the second straight month, providing room for the central bank to cut interest rates for the first time since September.】

item.title: 经济不确定性加剧，多伦多房屋销售下滑 29
item.description: 多伦多 2 月份的房屋销售量降至过去一年中的最低水平，原因是购房者在经济承受能力方面面临挑战，而且经济不确定性也给购房者造成了压力。【原文：Toronto home sales in February fell to the lowest level in the past year as affordability challenges and economic uncertainty weigh on buyers.】

item.title: 英伟达图表观察者准备迎接更多痛苦，跌势买家逍遥法外
item.description: 过去一个月来，Nvidia 公司股价遭受重创，市场技术人员一直在追踪一个关键的动量指标，以寻找未来更多麻烦的迹象。【原文：The selloff that’s hammered Nvidia Corp. shares over the past month has market technicians tracking a key momentum indicator for signs of more trouble ahead.】

item.title: 关税给经济增长带来风险，美元创三个月新低
item.description: 由于担心美国关税对经济产生负面影响，美元跌至三个月低点，其中兑欧元的跌幅尤为明显。【原文：The dollar fell to a three-month low on concerns about the negative impact of US tariffs on the economy, with losses particularly stark against the euro.】

item.title: Blackstone 即将以 4 亿美元收购印度 South City Mall
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度最大的业主之一 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc., one of the largest landlords in India, is nearing a deal to acquire South City Mall in Kolkata for as much as $400 million, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 曾是 Trafigura 首席执行官竞争者的 Hallouche 即将离开交易商
item.description: Trafigura 集团下游石油部门负责人、曾被誉为公司未来领导者的高管哈迪-哈卢什（Hadi Hallouche）即将离开公司。【原文：Hadi Hallouche, head of Trafigura Group’s downstream oil division and an executive who was once touted as the firm’s future leader, is leaving the company.】

item.title: 欧盟寻求将有争议的天然气存储目标延长两年
item.description: 尽管成员国普遍担心天然气储存规则助长了市场投机并抬高了价格，但欧盟仍将提议延长天然气储存目标。【原文：The European Union will propose an extension of gas-storage targets despite widespread concern among member states that the rules are contributing to market speculation and inflating prices.】

item.title: 英国调查揭露私募市场不良估值行为
item.description: 英国最高金融监管机构警告说，在快速发展的私募市场领域，估值可能存在无法缓解的利益冲突、记录保存不善和平滑波动等问题。【原文：Valuations in the rapidly-growing private markets arena can suffer from unmitigated conflicts of interest, poor record-keeping and smoothing of volatility, the UK’s top financial regulator warned.】

item.title: 印尼预算报告延迟发布令投资者寻找蛛丝马迹
item.description: 在印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）下令彻底改革支出和收入计划以促进经济增长之后，印尼每月预算数据报告的异常延迟引发了投资者对政府财政状况的质疑。【原文：An unusual delay in Indonesia’s reporting of monthly budget data has investors raising questions on the state of government finances after President Prabowo Subianto ordered a radical overhaul of spending and revenue plans to boost growth.】

item.title: 据说贝恩即将达成收购 Seven & i 超市资产的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本即将达成收购 Seven & i 控股公司超市业务的交易。【原文：Bain Capital is nearing a deal to buy Seven & i Holdings Co.’s supermarket business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰试图摆脱经济衰退之际，新西兰央行行长突然离职
item.description: 新西兰央行行长的意外辞职给这个以透明度为傲的机构留下了许多未解之谜，尤其是他离职的原因。【原文：The surprise resignation of New Zealand’s central bank governor leaves many unanswered questions for an institution that prides itself on transparency, not least the reason for his departure.】

item.title: 爱尔兰国际银行（AIB）预计爱尔兰国家份额将在五月降至个位数
item.description: AIB Group Plc 首席财务官在年度业绩报告发布后表示，在获得监管部门批准 12 亿欧元（13 亿美元）的回购计划后，预计爱尔兰政府将在 5 月份之前将其持股比例降至个位数。【原文：AIB Group Plc expects the Irish state to reduce its shareholding to single digits by May after receiving regulatory approval for a €1.2 billion ($1.3 billion) buyback, the bank’s chief financial officer said after its annual results statement.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia）人工智能服务器制造商鸿海两个月销售额增长25
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司在2025年前两个月的收入增长了25%，比去年有所加快，反映出人工智能计算需求的扩大。【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. posted a 25% rise in revenue during the first two months of 2025, quickening from last year in a reflection of expanding demand for AI computing.】

item.title: 印度掉期利率创 2022 年以来最低，宽松政策押注提前
item.description: 受当地通胀缓解和经济增长担忧的影响，投资者对印度提前降息进行了定位。【原文：Investors are positioning for earlier rate cuts in India, driven by easing local inflation and concerns over economic growth.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普反对电动汽车，三星仍考虑在美国建电池厂
item.description: 韩国三星 SDI 公司表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）取消了对电动汽车的补贴，但该公司仍对美国市场的增长持乐观态度。【原文：South Korea’s Samsung SDI Co. said it’s weighing the idea of another manufacturing plant in the US, signaling optimism about the market’s growth despite President Donald Trump rolling back subsidies for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 德国债券收益率因投资计划飙升至 2022 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于投资者担心为国防和基础设施投资提供资金的借贷会出现历史性增长，德国债券大幅下跌。【原文：German bonds slumped as investors braced for an historic increase in borrowing to fund defense and infrastructure investment.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将加入欧洲股市反弹的行列
拜耳预计利润将因农产品价格低迷而再次下滑
item.description: 拜耳公司预测利润将连续第三年下降，因为这家德国公司正努力应对美国的大规模诉讼、农产品价格下滑以及一些畅销药品面临的新竞争。【原文：Bayer AG forecast a third straight year of falling profit as the German company struggles with mass litigation in the US, slumping prices for agriculture products and fresh competition for some of its best-selling medicines.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Cybereason 首席执行官在董事会动荡后辞职
item.description: Cybereason Inc. 的首席执行官已经下台，因为他与投资者软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：Cybereason Inc.’s chief has stepped down following a months-long feud with investors SoftBank Group Corp. and former US Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin that’s stalled decision-making at the cash-strapped startup.】

item.title: 阿布扎比建筑公司着眼于首次公开募股，以利用阿联酋的房地产热
item.description: 阿拉伯建筑公司（Arabian Construction Co.【原文：Arabian Construction Co. is considering an initial public offering in the United Arab Emirates, the latest firm looking to capitalize on the country’s booming property market.】

item.title: 李嘉诚以 190 亿美元现金退出全球港口业务
item.description: 李嘉诚做交易的历史由来已久。最近的交易是这位 96 岁老人最大胆、也是最受欢迎的交易之一。【原文：Li Ka-shing has a long history of doing deals. The latest is one of the 96-year old’s boldest — and best received.】

item.title: 特朗普聚焦韩国 "高于中国 "的关税水平
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统指出，韩国对美国产品征收的关税比中国更不公平，同时抨击韩国向三星电子公司等外国芯片制造商发放补贴。【原文：President Donald Trump pointed to South Korea as a country with more unfair tariffs against American products than China, while slamming the handing out of subsidies for foreign chipmakers like Samsung Electronics Co.】

item.title: 经事实核查的特朗普关于美国经济的言论
item.description:
在概述第二个任期的目标时，总统就关税等话题发表了自己的观点，但这些观点并没有得到经济指标和研究的支持。【原文：

Outlining goals for his second term, the president asserted his opinion on topics such as tariffs that aren't supported by economic indicators and research.

】

item.title: 格陵兰选民权衡选举中最重要的问题：特朗普
item.description:
美国总统对北极岛屿的兴趣动摇了3月11日投票的竞选活动。【原文：

The US president’s interest in the Arctic island has shaken up campaigning for the March 11 vote.

】

item.title: 我们即将见证 "特朗普套餐 "是否真实存在
item.description:
关税验证了市场可以作为经济政策否决权的信念。【原文：

Tariffs test belief that markets can act as a veto on economic policy.

】

item.title: 欧盟 8000 亿欧元国防预算是正在酝酿的债券骚动
item.description:
欧盟的重整军备计划将首当其冲地落在债券市场的肩上。这意味着借贷成本将大幅提高。【原文：

The brunt of the EU’s plan to rearm will fall on the shoulders of bond markets. That means sharply higher borrowing costs.

】

item.title: 无烟雾、更廉价的英国会是什么样子
item.description:
只要政府加强沟通，前景是美好的。【原文：

The outlook is good, if only the government steps up communication.

】

item.title: Spotify 联合创始人的激进主义公司向新投资者敞开大门
item.description: 这家由 Spotify Technology SA 的亿万富翁、联合创始人马丁-洛伦松（Martin Lorentzon）支持的激进主义公司正在寻求外部资金，以建立其投资中小型上市公司的战略。【原文：The activist firm backed by Martin Lorentzon, the billionaire co-founder of Spotify Technology SA, is seeking external funds to build out its strategy of investing in small to medium-sized listed companies.】
